ObjTextEntries.textEntry: Oil on canvas attached to wall

Full 1/2 figure of man holding cloth before him, dominating background; before him, left background, are what appear to be 4 electrical towers, with sheds attached to towers.  At right background picture plane is two round buildings; in foreground, two men at left wearing gloves, caps and coveralls, welding; to their right, two men appear to be lifting welded metal.  Above painting, carved in lunette, is a mechanical drive device.

This mural was executed under the auspices of the Works Progress Administration's Federal Art Project.  The murals were specifically created for the Clare Middle School.
